p: We also detected the CSFV titres in the infected cells by quantitative real-time PCR and compared the replication curves. The results showed that significantly higher CSFV copy numbers were detected in the PK15-1A6 clone than those in the parent PK15 cells or the PK15-3B1 clone at all time points (P < 0.01) ( Fig. 5). At 48 hpi, the CSFV copy number generated in PK15-1A6 cells had increased to 10 8.89 copies/mL, which was much higher than those in the parent PK15 (10 6.13 copies/mL) and PK15-3B1 cells (10 5.79 copies/mL).
